Information for Presenters

Location

All Summer School courses will be held in classes located at the ground floor of building E6A.

  • Map of Macquarie University campus

Internet

The building has wireless access to the Internet. Alternatively it is possible to use the computers of the computer lab. Shortly we will post instructions to use these services.

Course Material

We will produce a CD and a printed copy with the course material. Please send the course material in PDF format to diego@ics.mq.edu.au by Wednesday 17 November 2004.

Classrooms

All classrooms will have an overhead projector, a whiteboard and a data projector. If you are bringing your laptop, this can be plugged to the data projector. If you are not bringing a laptop, you can bring your presentation in a CD-ROM or in a USB card.

If you require network access from your laptop you will need to use the wireless connection. We can lend wireless access cards for the days of the course. Shortly we will post more details.

  

For any comments or questions about these pages please contact the ALTA secretary.
